ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Szybka Surowka z Czerwonej Kapusty (Polish Red Cabbage Slaw)
des: "Polish people love their cabbage in every form and every color! This fresh red cabbage slaw is often made during the autumn months, when bright colors are much appreciated."
ins:
Bring 1 quart water to a boil in a large pot; add cabbage and cook until softened, 2 to 4 minutes. Drain.
Mix cabbage, onion, apple, lemon juice, and oil. Season with sugar, salt, and pepper.
